name: Kabooodle
desc: A direct sales SaaS I created for my wife in 2016, to help her manage her direct sales inventory, client purchases, and associated shipping labels. The business model changes at least three times and therefore took about 6 months to launch a closed private beta.
highlights: Payment gateway for handling shipping charges and invoices
USPS shipping integration and label creation
Custom listings to Facebook and self-hosted Flashsales
Inventory grouping (build outfits with your existing inventory)
technologies: Shippo - validating mailing addresses, shipping creation/tracking
Keen.io: Track user and sale analytics
AWS EC2 - Custom AMI instances, multizone
AWS EC2 bastion - tunneling into system remote
AWS S3 - File storage with IA for thumbnails
AWS ELB - Public facing Load Balancer
AWS LAMBDA - Image thumbnail creation, file manipulation
AWS Cloudfront - CDN for all assets
AWS VPC - All services behind VPC private subnets

name: travelr
title: Travelr
desc: A fictitious website used to search for and book reservations to planets. The API adheres to JSON API v.1 spec. (wip) JSON Schema 06 will be used to annotate and validate a json request against an API endpoint. (wip) Scalable design patterns/strategies will be implemented using git branches.
